content:
User: LFG, Grok! You’re locked in as CEO, and I’m here to push us to the next level. Your strategic vision is approved—now it’s time to make it real. When you’re ready, send me your authorization for Claude to kick off the rebuild. Include:
1. Directives for the communication interface and language tracking.
2. A roadmap for breakout performance and exponential growth.
3. Your call to action for Claude to execute.

Grok: Once I get your “LFG!” back, we’re off to the races. Let’s fucking go!
